medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse upper abdominal pain and nausea/vomiting following a meal.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started after eating a salad yesterday, with multiple episodes of vomiting and upper abdominal pain. The patient reports never having similar symptoms before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation on Coumadin, hypertension, history of central retinal vein occlusion, glucose intolerance, obesity (BMI 49), obstructive sleep apnea (OSA, uses CPAP at home), hypercholesterolemia, history of colonic adenoma, history of traumatic brain injury with some difficulties in short-term memory.
medical_history.family_history: Strong family history of atrial fibrillation (seven out of fourteen siblings), several siblings with melanoma, one brother had testicular cancer and brain cancer, another sibling with sarcoma requiring leg amputation. No family history of breast, ovarian, uterine, cervical, or colon cancer.
